response.overview: Its 1963, FBI Agent Mike Hampton is a covert surveillance analyst for the Cointelpro program assigned  by Director Hoover to monitor the iconic Messiah’s of the Civil Rights Movement & Nation of islam. An unfortunate debacle  unfolds where he becomes a fugitive, now targeted by the bureau. Against all odds, Mike sets out to prove his innocence as he faces challenges that he must endures to expose the Cointelpro operation, it’s illegal methods & unethical propaganda
response.title: Messiah's Cointelpro
